title: National standard for driving lorries (category C)

child_sections.title: Introduction
child_sections.description: What the standard is for, who it applies to and how it can be used.

child_sections.title: Role 1 Prepare yourself, the vehicle and its passengers for a journey
child_sections.description: What you must be able to do and understand when to prepare yourself, the vehicle and its passengers for a journey.

child_sections.title: Role 2 Guide and control the vehicle
child_sections.description: What you must be able to do and understand to guide and control the vehicle.

child_sections.title: Role 3 Use the road in accordance with the Highway Code
child_sections.description: What you must be able to do and understand about the Highway Code.

child_sections.title: Role 4 Drive safely and responsibly in the traffic system
child_sections.description: What you must be able to do and understand to drive safely and responsibly in traffic.

child_sections.title: Role 5 Review and adjust driving behaviour over lifetime
child_sections.description: What you must be able to do and understand about reviewing your driving and changing your behaviour.
